en.bdb: If I had known that my robe would come loose, I would have tied a tighter knot.
en.ms: If I had knows that my skirt would be broken loose, I would have put a fast knot.
en.ssk: If I had known that my robe would come loose, I would have tied a tighter knot.

es.sn: Si hubiera sabido que mi túnica se aflojaría, le hubiera puesto un mejor nudo,

hi.ss: (हे पति-प्रभू !) यदि मुझे समझ हो कि (इस पोटली के कारण तेरा पकड़ा हुआ) पल्ला छिज जाता है (भाव। तेरे से दूरी बन जाती है) तो मैं (तेरे पल्ले से ही) पक्की गाँठ डालूँ।
hi.sts: यदि मुझे मालूम होता कि प्रेम का ऑचल टूटने वाला है तो मैं मजबूत गांठ लगा देता।

en.bdb: I have found none as great as You, Lord; I have looked and searched throughout the world. ||5||
en.ms: As great as Thou, O Lord, I have found none. I have seen and searched the whole world.
en.ssk: I have found none as great as You, Lord; I have looked and searched throughout the world. ||5||

es.sn: no he encontrado a nadie tan Grandioso como Tú, Señor, me he cansado de buscar por el mundo. (5)

hi.ss: (हे साई !) मैंने सारा जगत फिर के देख लिया है। तेरे जैसा (साथी) मुझे और कोई नहीं मिला। 5।
hi.sts: हे सच्चे मालिक ! पूरी दुनिया घूम कर देख ली है, लेकिन तेरे जैसा दूसरा कोई नहीं ॥५॥
